name: They Come At Night
description:
You play as a wanderer in the woods whose set up house to get away from the growing civilization. Destroying an old totem to make way for your settling has angered the spirits of the land and has released its fury in the form of wolves to take you out. It's up to you to see how long you can survive the night.

Controls:

Use W/A/S/D to move

Use mouse to look around

Use 'R' to reload

Use 'F' to interact

1,2,3,4, 5 keys or scroll wheel  to cycle through weapons

Creators:

Tony Nguyen - Programmer

Basilio Bazan - Producer/Audio Design

Miguel Angel - Art

This was a half-semester long final project for our Level Design course at the University of Texas at Austin.  

Full credits with links will be in READ_ME.txt file upon download.
